A

AbstractBoard - Class in game.ai.shared.model
This abstract class will implement common methods shared for
Both TictactoeBoard and Connect4Board extending from IBoard
AbstractBoard(int, int, int) - Constructor for class game.ai.shared.model.AbstractBoard
 
AbstractGameFactory - Class in game.ai.shared.factory.specification
This is an abstract class that extends from IGameFactory
This class will implement some common methods shared among specific games
AbstractGameFactory() - Constructor for class game.ai.shared.factory.specification.AbstractGameFactory
 
AbstractPairsPlayerFactory - Class in game.ai.shared.player.factory
This abstract class extends from IPairsPlayerFactory
AbstractPairsPlayerFactory() - Constructor for class game.ai.shared.player.factory.AbstractPairsPlayerFactory
 
AbstractPlayer - Class in game.ai.shared.player
This class extends from IPlayer, implement some methods shared by AIPlayer and HumanPlayer
AbstractPlayer() - Constructor for class game.ai.shared.player.AbstractPlayer
When creating an IPlayer instance, default value is PlayerState.EMPTY
addController(IGameController) - Method in class game.ai.shared.player.AbstractPlayer
 
addController(IGameController) - Method in interface game.ai.shared.player.IPlayer
Register itself with IGameController
IGameController only handles HumanPlayer
addController(IGameController) - Method in class game.ai.shared.player.PairsPlayer
 
addController(IGameController) - Method in interface game.ai.shared.player.specification.PairsPlayerSpecification
Register itself with IGameController
AIPlayer - Class in game.ai.shared.player
This class is an implementation of IPlayer and AbstractPlayer
AI Player updates new value for IBoard by executing CommandChain
AIPlayer() - Constructor for class game.ai.shared.player.AIPlayer
When initializing, AI player will be added IRuleCollection that are defined by system
AIPlayerImportRulesSimulation - Class in tests.game.ai.simulation
This class is a simulation for importing strategy rules file of user for AIPlayer
AIPlayerImportRulesSimulation() - Constructor for class tests.game.ai.simulation.AIPlayerImportRulesSimulation
 
AIPlayerRulesLibrarySimulation - Class in tests.game.ai.simulation
This class is used to simulate the library of rules are assigned to different AIPlayer
These rules are generated by system and they are subset of standard rules
The simulation will create 2 pairs of AIPlayer and every AIPlayer has their rules and can play together
AIPlayerRulesLibrarySimulation() - Constructor for class tests.game.ai.simulation.AIPlayerRulesLibrarySimulation
 
applyCommandChain(IChain) - Method in class game.ai.shared.player.AIPlayer
This method is called when user wants to select rules from system library
and they are applied to AIPlayer
